comment.author: 21922532@N08
comment._content: This is a staged photo.  The body was dragged some distance to the location.  Even the gun was taken from someone else!

comment.author: 86142805@N00
comment._content: If you visit Gettysburg, it's creepy how much time has stood still. Maybe somebody rebuilt the wall in the spot to match the photo, but it definitely looks the same. Our guide showed us pictures of the same corpse in another spot on the hill, so they were definitely dragged around.
